title: Грибной царь
overview: The life of businessman Mikhail Dmitrievich Svirelnikov is going quite well. But he understands perfectly well that his ex-wife, mistress and daughter want only one thing from him - money. In order to provide for them, Mikhail has to commit fraud. One day, noticing surveillance, Svirelnikov understands that someone has revealed his secrets, and begins his investigation...
